headline: What Makes Everest Group LTD (EG) an Investment Bet?
summary: Heartland Advisors, an investment management company, released its “Heartland Mid Cap Value Fund” second quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The market rallied in the quarter, as the recession fears waned, and market sentiment shifted toward increased risk-taking. The fund lost 0.22% in the quarter compared to the […]
